item.title: Making Offline RL Online: Collaborative World Models for Offline Visual Reinforcement Learning
item.description: CoWorld: a novel model-based RL approach tackles offline visual RL challenges by using online simulators as testbeds, enabling flexible value estimation & mitigating overestimation bias for effective …
